synopsis.text: Sendou Erika, a vampire, and Hasekura Kouhei, a transfer student, find their lives intertwined in the prestigious Shuchikan Academy, a six-year school located on the remote Tamatsu Island, accessible only by boat. After a lifetime of constant school changes, Kouhei yearns for stability and friendship. However, his dream of a tranquil school life is shattered when he encounters Erika, the eccentric student council vice president, who reveals herself to be a creature of the night. Despite her initial aversion to Koui, he remains determined to form connections and navigate the challenges of his new environment, even if it involves befriending a vampire. Will Kouhei find the sense of belonging he's always craved in this unusual setting, or will the supernatural secrets of his classmates keep him at bay?
